clusters.name: Uncategorized Frontend Topic
clusters.description: This cluster contains items for which detailed metadata (title, tags, technology, prerequisites, complexity, etc.) was not provided. As such, thematic grouping, prerequisite identification, and precise learning sequence ordering are not possible. Items are placed in a generic cluster as a placeholder.

items.reason: This item was included as a single entry without any descriptive metadata (title, tags, prerequisites, etc.). Therefore, it is placed in a generic 'Uncategorized' cluster as its content and relationships to other topics are unknown. No specific ordering or prerequisite chain can be inferred.
